USER INPUT: 'Liste moi les publications de Prénom Nom.' QUERY: 'MATCH (p:Person)-[:HAS_NAME]->(pn:PersonName)-[:HAS_FIRST_NAME]->(fn:Literal), (pn)-[:HAS_LAST_NAME]->(ln:Literal), (p)-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]->(c:Contribution)<-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]-(d:Document) WHERE fn.value = 'Prénom' AND ln.value = 'Nom' OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:HAS_TITLE]->(french:Literal) WHERE french.language = 'fr' OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:HAS_TITLE]->(other:Literal) WHERE other.language <> 'fr' WITH coalesce(french, other) AS title RETURN DISTINCT title.value'
USER INPUT: 'Liste moi les laboratoires de l'université.' QUERY: 'MATCH (d:Literal)<-[:HAS_DESCRIPTION]-(lab:ResearchStructure)-[:HAS_NAME]->(n:Literal) RETURN DISTINCT lab.acronym,n.value,d.value'

USER INPUT: 'Sur quoi portent principalement les publications de Prénom Nom ?' QUERY: 'MATCH (p:Person)-[:HAS_NAME]->(pn:PersonName)-[:HAS_FIRST_NAME]->(fn:Literal), (pn)-[:HAS_LAST_NAME]->(ln:Literal), (p)-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]->(:Contribution)<-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]-(d:Document)-[:RECORDED_BY]->(sr:SourceRecord)-[:HAS_SUBJECT]->(c:Concept) WHERE fn.value = 'Prénom' AND ln.value = 'Nom' OPTIONAL MATCH (c)-[:HAS_PREF_LABEL]->(french:Literal) WHERE french.language = 'fr' OPTIONAL MATCH (c)-[:HAS_PREF_LABEL]->(other:Literal) WHERE other.language <> 'fr' WITH coalesce(french, other) AS l RETURN l AS Sujet, count(*) AS Nb ORDER BY Nb DESC LIMIT 10'

USER INPUT: 'Liste moi des publications sur le domaine de l'Archéobotanique.' QUERY: 'MATCH (d:Document)-[:RECORDED_BY]->(:SourceRecord)-[:HAS_SUBJECT]->(c:Concept)-[:HAS_PREF_LABEL|HAS_ALT_LABEL]->(l:Literal) WHERE toLower(l.value) CONTAINS toLower('Archéobotanique') RETURN DISTINCT d'

USER INPUT: 'Liste moi les principaux co-auteurs de Prénom Nom' QUERY: 'MATCH (p:Person)-[:HAS_NAME]->(pn:PersonName)-[:HAS_FIRST_NAME]->(fn:Literal), (pn)-[:HAS_LAST_NAME]->(ln:Literal) WHERE fn.value = 'Prénom' AND ln.value = 'Nom' MATCH (p)-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]->(:Contribution)<-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]-(d:Document) MATCH (d)-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]->(:Contribution)<-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]-(coauthor:Person) WHERE coauthor <> p RETURN coauthor.display_name AS Coauteur, count(DISTINCT d) AS NbPublicationsCommunes ORDER BY NbPublicationsCommunes DESC LIMIT 10'

USER INPUT: 'Quels chercheurs de l'université ont collaboré sur la revue Journal of Archaeological Science ?' QUERY: 'MATCH (journal:SourceJournal)<-[:ISSUED_BY]-(:SourceIssue)<-[:PUBLISHED_IN]-(:SourceRecord)<-[:RECORDED_BY]-(d:Document), (d)-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]->(:Contribution)<-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]-(p:Person) WHERE 'Journal of Archaeological Science' IN journal.titles AND p.external = False RETURN DISTINCT p.display_name AS Chercheur'

USER INPUT: 'Quels sont les principaux sujets des publications du laboratoire LAB ?' QUERY: 'MATCH (lab:ResearchStructure {acronym: 'LAB'})<-[:MEMBER_OF]-(p:Person)-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]->(:Contribution)<-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]-(d:Document)-[:RECORDED_BY]->(sr:SourceRecord)-[:HAS_SUBJECT]->(c:Concept) OPTIONAL MATCH (c)-[:HAS_PREF_LABEL]->(french:Literal) WHERE french.language = 'fr' OPTIONAL MATCH (c)-[:HAS_PREF_LABEL]->(other:Literal) WHERE other.language <> 'fr' WITH coalesce(french, other) AS l RETURN l AS Sujet, count(*) AS Nb ORDER BY Nb DESC LIMIT 10'

USER INPUT: 'Combien de documents ont été publiés par les chercheurs du laboratoire LAB ?' QUERY: 'MATCH (lab:ResearchStructure {acronym: 'LAB'})<-[:MEMBER_OF]-(p:Person)-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]->(:Contribution)<-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]-(d:Document) RETURN count(DISTINCT d) AS NombreDePublications'

USER INPUT: 'Quels journaux ont publié des articles sur les sujets liés à l'archéobotanique ?' QUERY: 'MATCH (sr:SourceRecord)-[:HAS_SUBJECT]->(c:Concept)-[:HAS_PREF_LABEL|HAS_ALT_LABEL]->(l:Literal) WHERE toLower(l.value) CONTAINS 'archéobotanique' MATCH (sr)-[:PUBLISHED_IN]->(:SourceIssue)-[:ISSUED_BY]->(j:SourceJournal) RETURN DISTINCT j.titles'

USER INPUT: 'Donne-moi les titres des publications ayant le concept 'climat' en français.' QUERY: 'MATCH (c:Concept)-[:HAS_PREF_LABEL]->(label:Literal) WHERE label.language = 'fr' AND toLower(label.value) CONTAINS 'climat' OPTIONAL MATCH (c)<-[:HAS_SUBJECT]-(sr:SourceRecord)-[:HAS_TITLE]->(french:Literal)WHERE french.language = 'fr' OPTIONAL MATCH (c)<-[:HAS_SUBJECT]-(sr:SourceRecord)-[:HAS_TITLE]->(other:Literal) WHERE other.language <> 'fr' WITH coalesce(french, other) AS title RETURN DISTINCT title.value'

USER INPUT: 'Quels laboratoires ont le mot 'archéologie' dans leur description ?' QUERY: 'MATCH (lab:ResearchStructure)-[:HAS_DESCRIPTION]->(desc:Literal) WHERE toLower(desc.value) CONTAINS 'archéologie' RETURN lab.acronym AS Acronyme, desc.value AS Description'

USER INPUT: 'Liste les publications co-écrites par au moins un membre du laboratoire LAB.' QUERY:'MATCH (lab:ResearchStructure {acronym: 'LAB'})<-[:MEMBER_OF]-(p:Person)-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]->(:Contribution)<-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]-(d:Document) OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:HAS_TITLE]->(french:Literal) WHERE french.language = 'fr' OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:HAS_TITLE]->(other:Literal) WHERE other.language <> 'fr' WITH coalesce(french, other) AS title RETURN DISTINCT title.value'
USER INPUT: 'Combien de chercheurs ont un identifiant ORCID ?' QUERY: 'MATCH (p:Person)-[:HAS_IDENTIFIER]->(id:AgentIdentifier) WHERE id.type = 'orcid' RETURN DISTINCT count(p)'

USER INPUT: 'Quels concepts sont associés à plus de 50 publications ?' QUERY: 'MATCH (sr:SourceRecord)-[:HAS_SUBJECT]->(c:Concept) WITH c, count(DISTINCT sr) AS NbPublications WHERE NbPublications > 50 OPTIONAL MATCH (c)-[:HAS_PREF_LABEL]->(fr:Literal) WHERE fr.language = 'fr' OPTIONAL MATCH (c)-[:HAS_PREF_LABEL]->(other:Literal) WHERE other.language <> 'fr' WITH coalesce(fr, other) AS label, NbPublications RETURN label.value AS Sujet, NbPublications ORDER BY NbPublications DESC'
USER INPUT: 'Y'a t-il des laboratoires sans acronyme ?' QUERY: 'MATCH (lab:ResearchStructure) WHERE lab.acronym IS NULL RETURN DISTINCT lab'

USER INPUT: 'Quels laboratoires ont des chercheurs travaillant sur les Manuscrits et le Moyen-Âge ?' QUERY: 'MATCH (lab:ResearchStructure)<-[:MEMBER_OF]-(p:Person)-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]->(:Contribution)<-[:HAS_CONTRIBUTION]-(d:Document)-[:RECORDED_BY]->(:SourceRecord)-[:HAS_SUBJECT]->(c:Concept) OPTIONAL MATCH (c)-[:HAS_PREF_LABEL|HAS_ALT_LABEL]->(l:Literal) WITH lab, p, collect(DISTINCT toLower(l.value)) AS labels WHERE any(label IN labels WHERE label CONTAINS 'moyen-âge') AND any(label IN labels WHERE label CONTAINS 'manuscrits') RETURN DISTINCT lab.acronym AS acronyme'
